hymn.title: Praise, praise ye the name of our Savior and God

layout.singingstanza: Praise, praise ye the name of our Sav -- ior and God; De -- clare, oh, de -- clare ye His glo -- ries a -- broad; Pro -- claim ye His mer -- cy, from na -- tion to na -- tion, Till the ut -- ter -- most is -- lands have heard His sal -- va -- tion. For His love flow -- eth on, free and full as a riv -- er; And His mer -- cy en -- du -- reth for -- ev -- er and ev -- er.

lyrics.stanza: For His love floweth on, free and full as a river; And His mercy endureth forever and ever.
Her bridal attire, and her festal array, All nature shall see on that glorious day; For her King cometh down with His people to reign, And His presence shall bless her with glory in men.
